title: Far Right Northern League courts Italy's south
text:
Far Right Northern League courts Italy's south Friday, February 09, 2018 - 01:39 
Italy's far-right Northern League party once derided the south as crime-riddled and parasitic. Now, it's courting votes there on its anti-immigrant platform. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Italy's far-right Northern League party once derided the south as crime-riddled and parasitic. Now, it's courting votes there on its anti-immigrant platform. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sjoVG6
